description:
After the Christmas Eve plan he worked on for two weeks is ruined, Ryou gets into a snowball fight with the Fleurir teachers. Will Tsubaki`s love bear fruit? How will the friendly(?) rivalry between Gilbert and Yoshinosuke end? What will come of Ryou and Mitsuki`s fated battle? Sayuri is experiencing a new and unique Christmas Eve...
Source: crunchyroll
